data.name: fishy
data.detailed_description:
Fishy is a short, heartfelt visual novel about friends, enemies, acceptance, and monsters.

Play as a middle schooler with a prosthetic arm, navigating fear and friendship. Explore the aquarium, face your fears, and maybe even make a friend.

Fishy features 583 individual hand-drawn sea creatures and an atmospheric original score.

A lovingly crafted bite-sized journey, Fishy is best experienced when played in one sitting (roughly 30 minutes).

Features:

  • roughly 30 minute story
  • 583 unique hand drawn sea animals
  • original soundtrack
  • sharks
  • "sharks"
  • sparkling water (flavors: cherry, grapefruit, citrus)

**Please note that this game contains the following elements**


  • pg-13 levels of psychological horror related to feelings of anxiety
  • body horror for humans and animals
  • loud noises
This game does not contain jumpscares, but does feature visuals that some players may find disturbing.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista or higher.
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
